title: Removing Odor from Water with Charcoal
brief: Use charcoal from fire to remove unpleasant odors from water sources.
steps: Step 1: Take charcoal pieces from your fire (ensure they are completely extinguished).
Step 2: Add the charcoal directly to the smelly water.
Step 3: Let the water stand undisturbed for 45 minutes.
Step 4: Strain out the charcoal pieces before drinking.
Step 5: Still purify the water by boiling or chemical treatment after odor removal.
warnings: This only removes odors - you must still purify the water to kill harmful organisms.
Use only charcoal from wood fires, not from other burned materials.
Ensure charcoal is completely cool before adding to water.
